DOC.brief_summary: Light Endoscopic Robot evaluation abdominal urological laparoscopic surgery : surgery surgeon robot ( REL group = new treatment ) versus surgery surgeon assistant ( AO group - standard treatment ) Primary outcome measure : Number useful hand ( light endoscopic robot = one useful mechanical hand )
DOC.brief_title: Light Endoscopic Robot Use Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Laparoscopic surgery indicate Subject ASA Score 1 , 2 3 Subject health social protection 18 year age old Written Informed Consent Subject pregnant lactating Subject jail Subject hospitalize without consent Protected person age 18 year old Subject participate another study
